about_the_game:
Experience the daring escape from Arcadia in a brand-new way with the American Arcadia Artbook.

This Artbook contains the vibrant visuals of a retro-futuristic dystopia inspired by the 70s, in contrast with the grey and grim real world, where the only colors come from the screens.

Includes concept art, illustrations, and 3D renders of the environments, characters, and puzzles that can be found while escaping from Arcadia.

Dive into the artistic heart of American Arcadia, where passion, dedication, music, and creativity have come together to create an unforgettable experience.
